attributes.additional_details:
Stop the Government smearing human beings who receive welfare payments linking them to the horrendous crimes committed by the recently sentanced Phillpotts.

George Osborne has said that a debate was needed about whether the state should "subsidise lifestyles like that".

The chancellor has previously complained about those who lie in "sleeping off a life on benefits".

I object to being smeared by the Government and linking people on benefit with a life of crime.
